xwikidoc.content:
contrib.meeting.home.presentation=Welcome to the XWiki Meeting Application. Create your own meeting by clicking on "Add New Entry". You can also check out a [[**Calendar**>>calendarView]] of all the meetings.
Meeting.MeetingClass_status_value1=In preparation Meeting.MeetingClass_status_value2=Active Meeting.MeetingClass_status_value3=Cancelled Meeting.MeetingClass_status_value4=Finished
contrib.meeting.app.title=Meetings contrib.meeting.home.title=Meetings contrib.meeting.calendarView=Calendar View contrib.meeting.calendarView.title=Calendar View contrib.meeting.calendarView.noMacro.admin=To display the calendar view of the meetings, you need to install the Full Calendar Macro on this wiki : contrib.meeting.calendarView.noMacro.noAdmin=We are missing the macro displaying the calendar view. Ask this wiki administrator to install the "FullCalendar" Macro.
meeting.livetable.doc.title=Meeting meeting.livetable.doc.name=Title meeting.livetable.leader=Leader meeting.livetable.place=Place meeting.livetable.durationString=Duration meeting.livetable.startDate=Start meeting.livetable.status=Status meeting.livetable.emptyvalue=- meeting.livetable._actions=Actions

contrib.meeting.notification.success=A notification email has successfully been sent to the participants. contrib.meeting.notification.failure=An error occured while sending the notification emails. contrib.meeting.notification.sending=Sending notification... contrib.meeting.notification.requestError=There was an error sending your request. Please try again. contrib.meeting.notification.title=You are invited to participate in a meeting: {0} contrib.meeting.notification.body={0} invited you to participate in the meeting {1}. contrib.meeting.notification.link=See the meeting page on XWiki. contrib.meeting.notification.view.event = View your event at contrib.meeting.notification.submit=Send an invitation email to these users contrib.meeting.notification.additionalMessage=Type here the message you want to send to the participants (optional) : contrib.hr.notification.additionalPart=His/her message:
# Next Meetings panel contrib.meeting.panel.title=Next Meetings contrib.meeting.panel.noMeetings=There are no upcoming meetings. contrib.meeting.panel.addmeeting=Add meeting contrib.meeting.panel.viewallmeetings=View all meetings
# Next Meetings macro rendering.macro.nextmeetings.name=Next Meetings rendering.macro.nextmeetings.description=Displays a defined number of upcoming meetings rendering.macro.nextmeetings.parameter.limit.name=Limit rendering.macro.nextmeetings.parameter.limit.description=Number of maximum entries. rendering.macro.nextmeetings.parameter.homelink.name=Home Link rendering.macro.nextmeetings.parameter.homelink.description=Show a link pointing to the Meetings homepage. Possible values are "show" and "hide". rendering.macro.nextmeetings.parameter.status.name=Status rendering.macro.nextmeetings.parameter.status.description=Show the status of the meeting. Possible values are "show" and "hide".
# XPoll Application contrib.meeting.createPoll=Create a poll for this meeting contrib.meeting.poll.explanation=A poll has been created in order to define the meeting details. Click on the link below to access it. contrib.meeting.poll.go=Go to the poll
# Map Macro contrib.meeting.map.error.deactivation=Map could not be displayed: contrib.meeting.map.error.zeroResults=no results found! contrib.meeting.map.error.overQueryLimit=exceeded quota! contrib.meeting.map.error.requestDenied=request denied! contrib.meeting.map.error.invalidRequest=invalid request! contrib.meeting.map.error.unknownError=unknown error!
